channel.title: Best Bots?
channel.description:
I want to make a f2p botting account either mining, wcing or fishing (Or eventually all 3).
What are the best bots and if you get caught do they ban you IP or just your account?

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“EwfsPrince, post:22, topic:353536”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=449851.msg3302685#msg3302685 date=1281417869]

All bots that dont take the use of the mouse are going against laws and copyrights.

And why would that be exactly? I don’t know where you got that information from, but it’s wrong. If you don’t distribute Jagex’s property, it isn’t illegal, regardless of what Jagex tells you. (Any type of bot would be against Jagex’s TOS, but that does not make it illegal, ever)
[/quote]
My point entirely. I’m oblivious to how Jagex manages to get bot websites shutdown.
I get pretty pissed when I see posted DCMA letters saying what they are doing is ilegal when they technically mean it’s only ilegal against their TOS, and of course 12 yr old kids actually believe they are breaking the law by doing it (besides the obvious point of the client being technically ilegal etc)[/quote]

It’s probably as others said because they buy/sell accounts, or use jagex’s pictures or the like. Also, the client isn’t an issue because any decent bot will download the client straight of runescape’s website and modify it on-the-fly if needed, it shouldn’t be distributed.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:353536”][quote author=marcbob link=topic=449851.msg3302078#msg3302078 date=1281382695]
All bots that dont take the use of the mouse are going against laws and copyrights.
[/quote]

And why would that be exactly? I don’t know where you got that information from, but it’s wrong. If you don’t distribute Jagex’s property, it isn’t illegal, regardless of what Jagex tells you. (Any type of bot would be against Jagex’s TOS, but that does not make it illegal, ever)[/quote]
My point entirely. I’m oblivious to how Jagex manages to get bot websites shutdown.
I get pretty pissed when I see posted DCMA letters saying what they are doing is ilegal when they technically mean it’s only ilegal against their TOS, and of course 12 yr old kids actually believe they are breaking the law by doing it (besides the obvious point of the client being technically ilegal etc)

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“EwfsPrince, post:18, topic:353536”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449851.msg3300605#msg3300605 date=1281283008]

IP banning is stupid because most people have a dynamic ip, so all they have to do is re-log into their internet and probably get assigned with a new ip.

@OP: I don’t have experience with it, but Qurlion seems likes a decent bot which hasn’t been shut down :p.

Qurlion is gone, they shut down a week or so ago.
[/quote]
I don’t understand how these sites can get shutdown. They aren’t ilegal in themselves.[/quote]

Because they do illegal things, like sell items and such. Qurlion was only shut down because they couldn’t keep the bot updated enough. Not because of Jagex.

Read full topic

item.description:

All bots that dont take the use of the mouse are going against laws and copyrights.

As for a bot site use rsbots dot net

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Fat Cookies:

IP banning is stupid because most people have a dynamic ip, so all they have to do is re-log into their internet and probably get assigned with a new ip.

This. And with such a large player base, IP banning someone with a dynamic IP could potentially ban other innocent players. This is why they don’t do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

They do not IP Ban normally as you’re all retards and buy membership, when you get banned you create a new account and buy it again thus making them free money.

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:353536”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=449851.msg3300125#msg3300125 date=1281234766]

They might* if he bots multiple accounts.

I’ve never heard of Jagex banning players’ IP addresses.
[/quote]

It is very, very rare though. Banning IP addresses is a pretty bad practice no matter how you do it.[/quote]I have a quick question, I was banned off of some different forums (d2jsp, Not sure if you’ve heard of it) so i went ahead and changed and masked my IP & hostname and i was still banned? Is it possible that they could of banned my internet? if so then how?

Read full topic

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:7, topic:353536”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=449851.msg3300106#msg3300106 date=1281233401]
They might* if he bots multiple accounts.
[/quote]
I’ve never heard of Jagex banning players’ IP addresses.[/quote]

It is very, very rare though. Banning IP addresses is a pretty bad practice no matter how you do it.

item.title: Best Bots?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:7, topic:353536”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=449851.msg3300106#msg3300106 date=1281233401]
They might* if he bots multiple accounts.
[/quote]
I’ve never heard of Jagex banning players’ IP addresses.[/quote]They most certainly do! Jagex bans the IPs that are mainly used by macroers and real world item traders, which are obviously against the rules! They stated this in a Runescape news article, shown below.
http://news.runescape.com/newsitem.ws?id=785

Heres the quote from jagex

We can (and do) ban them - including using IP bans

Read full topic

For all the time I have botted don’t be worried, wcing…you mite get banned about other then that you should be fine, I have botted a miner for 3days without stopping and didn’t get banned. Wcing I got banned for though.
